name: Classic Margherita Pizza
description: A simple and delicious pizza with fresh basil, mozzarella, and tomatoes.

name: Spaghetti Carbonara
description: A creamy pasta dish made with eggs, cheese, pancetta, and pepper.

name: Vegetarian Tacos
description: Tasty tacos filled with seasoned vegetables, black beans, and fresh salsa.

name: Chicken Alfredo
description: A creamy, cheesy pasta dish with grilled chicken and fettuccine noodles.

name: Beef Stir-Fry
description: Quick stir-fried beef with colorful vegetables in a savory sauce.

name: Classic Caesar Salad
description: Crisp romaine lettuce, creamy Caesar dressing, croutons, and parmesan cheese.

name: Chocolate Chip Cookies
description: Classic cookies with gooey chocolate chips and a soft, chewy texture.

name: Lentil Soup
description: A hearty and healthy soup made with lentils, vegetables, and spices.

name: Apple Pie
description: A sweet, cinnamon-spiced apple filling in a flaky pie crust.

name: BBQ Ribs
description: Tender, slow-cooked ribs coated in smoky barbecue sauce.
